title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the focus does not move to the selected Combo.
OB: The focus caret does not move to the first Combo 'Host:' when clicked on.
EB: The focus caret should move to the first Combo 'Host:' when clicked on.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus is not shifted to the first Combo 'Host:'.
